name: Jordan Williams
bio: Passionate about spacecraft systems and student leadership. Leading AIAA TMU to new heights.

bio: Focused on propulsion systems and event coordination. Making aerospace accessible to all students.

bio: Keeping our operations smooth and documentation on point. Also leading our web development initiatives.

bio: Connecting with high schools and community groups to inspire the next generation of aerospace professionals.
